options.name: Battle-Hardened
options.description: Your body and mind have been conditioned through countless battles and hardships. Gain +1 skill with endurance and +1 resolve.

options.name: Last Stand
options.description: Once per day, when you reach 0 health, you roll an endurance check and gain morale equal to the highest dice rolled instead of entering lifeline. While in lifeline, the first time you roll a 1 on the lifeline table, you reroll.

options.name: Killing Frenzy
options.description: Combat invigorates you rather than wearing you down. Gain +1 skill with might. When you kill a creature with a melee weapon, gain an additional action once per turn.

options.name: Deathless Rage
options.description: While at 0 health, you completely restore your energy when you hit a creature with an action. Additionally, gain +1 maximum energy.

options.name: Reaction : Vengeful Strike
options.description: In response to a creature within your melee range dealing damage to you, you make an attack against them with a melee weapon. When you make this attack, add a might dice into your weapon check pool.

options.name: Reaction : Endure Pain
options.description: In response to being targeted by an attack, your defense check automatically becomes a 3. Make an endurance check and double the result; if the result is higher than the total damage of the attack, the damage is halved before applying mitigation.

options.name: Weapon Master
options.description: Your mastery of heavy weapons has reached professional levels. Gain +1 skill with complex melee weapons.

options.name: Scarred Veteran
options.description: You have a reputation for being hard to take down. Gain +1 physical mitigation and +2 health.

options.name: Twin Fury
options.description: You have the coordination and strength to wield heavy weapons in your offhand. Gain +1 coordination. You can dual wield any one-handed complex melee weapon, not just simple weapons.

options.name: Action : Devastating Blow
options.description: You make an attack with a melee weapon, but instead of making an attack with your melee weapon skill, use a might skill check. If you are below 10 health, this attack deals extra damage equal to your primary weapon damage.
